Text.Page:
We have a unique opportunity here to learn what makes the argons tick. There's another bubble, and more of those {@Creature:45#7003#spires}, by the northwestern swamp. Check them out, and bring back some fragments. I'll compare them to the others.

If you see the argonomorph tuwangi leader while you're there, take him out.
Thank you. Did everything go smoothly?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"A tuwangi called me an intruder."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Intruder, eh?

So perhaps the spires are an alarm of some sort. The federation could use something like that.

The tuwangis are protecting the spires. I hope killing the leader will cause the others to scatter so we can investigate further.
I need pieces of those controller spires from the northwestern swamp.
